title: Introduction to Programming
description: Learn the basics of programming using Python. This course covers fundamental concepts such as variables, control structures, functions, and data types.

title: Advanced Web Development
description: Dive deep into modern web development with React and Node.js. This course will cover front-end and back-end development techniques.

title: Data Science Essentials
description: An introduction to data science concepts, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning with Python and R.

title: Graphic Design for Beginners
description: Explore the principles of graphic design using tools like Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator. Ideal for beginners.

title: Digital Marketing Strategies
description: Learn effective digital marketing strategies, including SEO, social media marketing, and content creation.
